original_title: Ken Ham’s Foundations - Revealing the Unknown God
overview: Do we need to change our approach to evangelism?  American culture has changed substantially, but our approach to evangelism has not. The key is to “de-Greekize” our families and our churches, beginning with ourselves! To truly reach today’s culture we have to help them understand that God’s Word is true as we spread the seed of  the gospel.
title: Ken Ham’s Foundations - Revealing the Unknown God
